summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a narrow urban road with parked cars on both sides. At 9.0s, a motorcycle suddenly appears from the left side and crashes in front of the vehicle, causing the driver to stop abruptly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed until 9.0s when a motorcycle suddenly crashes in front of it, causing the driver to stop immediately to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A motorcycle, approximately 0 meters away, crashed in front of the vehicle, causing the driver to stop abruptly.
